name: UNRAWIFY
description:
A short puzzle platformer where you need to "unrawify" your game (add features) to get to the exit!

Controls (keyboard): Arrows keys for movement, SPACE to select, BACKSPACE to go back to menu
Controls (mobile): Touch and mobile buttons

My submission to Gamedev.js Jam 2022.

Web Monetization:
Change the music from "Grooovy" to some dirty, badass "Rock 'n' Roll". Help me to finance my rock 'n' roll lifestyle! Thanks. (only during the rating period of the jam: Press "M" to simulate Web Monetization).

Story:
You just created your first game, however it is still pretty RAW. Due to a coding error you somehow got caught in your own game and need to reach the exit and escape. To do that you first need to UNRAWIFY your game: Go to a breakpoint, add a new feautre and create a new build. Repeat that until you are able to reach the exit. Good Luck!

Credits and Tools:
GitHub Page

Framework: Phaser 3
Web-Monetization: Coil.com
Code: Home made spaghetti code using WebStorm
Bundler: vite.js
Graphics: Hand painted using Aseprite
Sound: All by myself :) using Reaper, Focusrite Scarlett 2i2 interface, a Kala U-Bass and a Gibson SG Special.
Gamedev Knowledge: Zenva Academy
